lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Although the LDP had more than enough votes to ram the budget through parliament, it had been reluctant to do so for fear of a backlash of public opinion, especially after its setback in recent local elections due to the sales tax issue.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The opposition parties had already delayed passage of the budget for three weeks after the April 1 start of the fiscal year by intermittent parliamentary boycotts.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The sales tax was originally scheduled to be introduced next January to help offset the loss of government revenues stemming from a cut in income and corporate taxes due to go into effect this month.
